views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 9 and till 12.4 (Including arm64e/A12 Devices).

playbackSafari is a Tiny Tweak that Allows the Videos Background Playback on Safari!

The Tweak Gives the Opportunity to Start Playing a Video in the Safari iOS App without Experiencing Any Interruptions to the Sound Playback even after the Closing of the App or Locking the Device!

playbackSafari is now out from the Beta Stage of My Repository.
If you Have got My Repo Version, Just Uninstall it and Install this New One.

No options to Configure.

No Screenshots for this Item.

Thanks @_024ka for testing.

Feel free to contact me via Mail or via Twitter @CydiaGeek, enjoy it, thanks! :)

would be greatly appreciated!
